about_the_game:
Take part in a time-limited quest to celebrate the occasion of Endless Day, and try to uncover the secrets behind the strange awakenings in the Endless Ruins--as well as the whereabouts of the mysterious Archivist…

[Content only available between the 21st and 25th of January!]


  • Exclusive Quest
  • Unlockable Archivist Hero
  • New Planet Anomaly

  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 775M | Radeon HD 6970 | Intel Iris Pro

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows (64bits only) 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: i3 4th generation / i5 2nd generation / A6 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon 5800 series / NVidia 550Ti

  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible

pc_requirements.recommended:

  • OS *: Windows (64bits only) 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: i3 5th generation (or newer) / i5 3rd generation (or newer) / FX4170 (or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 8000 series or newer / NVidia GTX 660 or newer

  • Storage: 8 GB available space

  • Additional Notes: Recommended Resolution: 1920 x 1080
